name: Folsom VR_AR ScifiVRGame
description:
A Scifi theme shooter game where you defend the city from attacking aliens. There is a co-op multiplayer option that will be uploaded in the near future. The current version posted is single player.

Note: Press menu/start button on left controller to clear menu on login, there is bug where the raycast for the menu selector isn't working in current version.

Quest version is multiplayer example with limited aliens.

Windows is a single player example.

Supported: Oculus
